ajxpcore.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Pydio Main Options]
ajxpcore.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Main container for core Pydio settings (application title, sharing, webdav server config, etc...)]

global_param.name: APPLICATION_TITLE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[App Title]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Your application title]

global_param.name: DEFAULT_LANGUAGE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Default Language]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Default language when a user does not have set his/her own.]

global_param.name: SERVER_URL
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Server URL]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Server URL used to build share links and notifications. It will be detected if empty.]

global_param.name: PUBLIC_DOWNLOAD_FOLDER
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Download Folder]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Absolute path to the public folder where temporary download links will be created. Setting this empty will disable the sharing feature.]

global_param.name: PUBLIC_DOWNLOAD_URL
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Download URL]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[If not inferred directly from the current ajaxplorer URI plus the public download folder name, replace the public access URL here.]

global_param.name: WEBDAV_ENABLE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Enable WebDAV]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Enable the webDAV support. Please READ THE DOC to safely use this feature.]

global_param.name: WEBDAV_BASEURI
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Shares URI]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Common URI to access the shares. Please READ THE DOC to safely use this feature.]

global_param.name: WEBDAV_BASEHOST
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Shares Host]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Host used in webDAV protocol. Should be detected by default. Please READ THE DOC to safely use this feature.]

global_param.name: WEBDAV_DIGESTREALM
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Digest Realm]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Default realm for authentication. Please READ THE DOC to safely use this feature.]

global_param.name: WEBDAV_FORCE_BASIC
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Force Basic Auth]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[This authentication mechanism is less secure, but will avoid the users having to re-enter a password in some case.]

global_param.name: WEBDAV_BROWSER_LISTING
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Browser Access]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Display the list of files and folder when accessing through the browser]

global_param.name: CMDLINE_ACTIVE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Command-line Active]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Use Pydio framework via the command line, allowing CRONTAB jobs or background actions.]

global_param.name: CLI_PHP
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Command-line PHP]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[On specific hosts, you may have to use a specific path to access the php command line]

global_param.name: CLI_USE_COM
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Use COM class]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[On Windows running IIS, set this option to true if the COM extension is loaded, this may enable the use of the php command line.]

global_param.name: DISABLE_ZIP_BROWSING
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Disable Zip browsing]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Disable Zip files inline browsing. This can be necessary if you always store huge zip archives: it can have some impact on performance.]

global_param.name: ZIP_CREATION
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Zip Creation]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[If you encounter problems with online zip creation or multiple files downloading, you can disable the feature.]

global_param.name: ZIP_ENCODING
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Zip Encoding]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Set up a specific encoding (try IBM850 or CP437) for filenames to fix characters problems during Zip creation. This may create OS-incompatible archives (Win/Mac).]

global_param.name: GZIP_COMPRESSION
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Gzip Download]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Gzip files on-the-fly before downloading. Disabled by default, as it's generally useful only on small files, and decreases performances on big files. This has nothing to see with the Zip Creation feature, it's just a on-the-fly compression applied on a unique file at download.]

global_param.name: GZIP_LIMIT
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Gzip Limit]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[If activated, a default limit should be set above when files are no more compressed.]

global_param.name: SKIP_ADMIN_RIGHTS_ALL_REPOS
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Skip auto-update admin rights]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[If you have tons of workspaces (which is not recommanded), admin users login can take a long time while updating admin access to all repositories. Use this option to disable this step, admin will always have access to the Settings.]

global_param.name: NODENAME_MAX_LENGTH
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Filename length]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Maximum characters length of new files or folders]

global_param.name: AJXP_TMP_DIR
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Temporary Folder]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[This is necessary only if you have errors concerning the tmp dir access or writeability : most probably, they are due to PHP SAFE MODE (should disappear in php6) or various OPEN_BASEDIR restrictions. In that case, create and set writeable a tmp folder somewhere at the root of your hosting (but above the web/ or www/ or http/ if possible!!) and enter here the full path to this folder]
